name: Speed City: Racing Cars 2018
description:
Welcome to the Speed City! Here there's only one way to win others respect: Racing!!
Choose one of the best sport cars in the world and hit the road. These illegal races are full of dangers, dodge the vehicles and speed through the streets to become the king of the urban races.
Enjoy the most exquisit 3d graphics and feel the adrenaline boost while you are riding at maximum speed in a highway full of traffic. You can choose among different game modes, weather conditions and of course cars.
Challenge yourself in every race and play every day to receive daily rewards! Are you ready?!

GAME HIGHLIGHTS:
- 7 Unlockable Cars
- 4 Unlockable Game Modes
- Custom Difficulty
- Custom Weather
- Multiple Levels
- Daily Rewards
